paper_abstract: We have introduced and characterized a fully regular (V-regular) class of an ordered AG-groupoid in terms of fuzzy (left, right, two-sided, interior, bi-, generalized bi- and quasi) ideals. We have shown that all these fuzzy ideals need not to be coincide in an ordered AG-groupoid S even if S has a left identity but on the other hand, it has been shown that all these fuzzy ideals coincide in a V-regular ordered AG-groupoid with a left identity.
paper_title: On fuzzy fully regular ordered AG-groupoids
